level.heading: Application to pending actions.
level.text: This chapter applies to requests for discovery in cases pending on May 22, 2010.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-147
level.text: For Law 18-147, see notes following ยง 13-441.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 8 of the Uniform Interstate Depositions and Discovery Act.
